notes: An unlikely friendship formed when Theron helped Elara navigate Thornwood safely. They respect each other's need for solitude.
Elara studied at Cloudspire Academy under Aldric the Grey. Her thesis on pre-Sundering magical theory is still referenced today.
Mira occasionally crafts specialized tools for Elara's research. They share a mutual respect for craftsmanship in their respective fields.
Theron has lived in Thornwood Forest for ten years, serving as its primary guardian and liaison with Silverhollow.
Born and raised in Silverhollow before joining the military. His family still lives there, unaware he's alive.
Mira runs the Stonehart Forge, the finest smithy in town. She's been a resident for five years.
Silverhollow sits at the edge of Thornwood Forest. The Thornwood Accord established peaceful relations between the two.
Elara frequently visits Thornwood seeking clues to the Library of Moonveil. Theron guides her to the safer areas.
Theron trades forest materials with Mira. They share a similar taciturn nature and respect for honest work.
